member.name: T:KoheletNetwork.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: Eine stark typisierte Ressourcenklasse zum Suchen von lokalisierten Zeichenfolgen usw.

member.name: P:KoheletNetwork.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Gibt die zwischengespeicherte ResourceManager-Instanz zurück, die von dieser Klasse verwendet wird.

member.name: P:KoheletNetwork.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Überschreibt die CurrentUICulture-Eigenschaft des aktuellen Threads für alle Ressourcenzuordnungen, die diese stark typisierte Ressourcenklasse verwenden.

member.name: P:KoheletNetwork.ZefaniaXmlBible.XsdDirectory
member.summary: The directory path where the XSD schema files for ZefaniaXml are stored

member.summary: Full bible name

member.name: P:KoheletNetwork.ZefaniaXmlBible.BibleInfoIdentifier
member.summary: Unique identifier for bible name

member.summary: Check for the XML schema name and validate accordingly

member.name: M:KoheletNetwork.ZefaniaXmlBible.ValidateXmlDataWithSchema(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Check the XmlDocument based on its named schema

member.name: M:KoheletNetwork.ZefaniaXmlBible.IsValidXml
member.summary: Is the XmlDocument successfully validated against the XmlSchema
member.remarks: , Success on warnings or without any
member.returns: False on exceptions or validation errors, True on warnings, True without any errors or warnings

member.name: P:KoheletNetwork.ZefaniaXmlBible.Books
member.summary: List of all available books

member.summary: Validate the XmlDocument as well as internal data structure inclusive all child objects

member.name: P:KoheletNetwork.ZefaniaXmlBible.ValidationErrors
member.summary: Validation errors (not warnings) detected by method ValidateDeeply()

member.summary: Validation warnings detected by method IsValidXml (only XmlDocument schema validation)

member.name: P:KoheletNetwork.ZefaniaXmlBible.ValidationXmlErrors
member.summary: Validation errors detected by method IsValidXml (only XmlDocument schema validation)

member.summary: Catch validation events for warnings or errors

member.summary: Convert an exception into a string

member.summary: Move this book to a new position in the bible collection

member.name: P:KoheletNetwork.ZefaniaXmlBook.BookName
member.summary: This attribut should hold the book name in long form, e.g. "Genesis"

member.name: P:KoheletNetwork.ZefaniaXmlBook.BookShortName
member.summary: This attribute holds the book book name in short form, e.g. "Gen"

member.summary: A number which is unambiguous for a certain bible book

member.name: P:KoheletNetwork.ZefaniaXmlBook.Chapters
member.summary: List of all available chapters

member.summary: This attribut should hold the chapter number, e.g. "1"

member.name: P:KoheletNetwork.ZefaniaXmlChapter.Captions
member.summary: List of all available captions

member.name: P:KoheletNetwork.ZefaniaXmlChapter.Verses
member.summary: List of all available verses

member.name: P:KoheletNetwork.ZefaniaXmlVerse.ContentText
member.summary: This verse content as plain text

member.name: P:KoheletNetwork.ZefaniaXmlVerse.ContentXml
member.summary: This verse content with Zefania XML markup

member.name: P:KoheletNetwork.ZefaniaXmlVerse.VerseNumber
member.summary: This attribut holds the referenced verse number, e.g. "1"

member.name: P:KoheletNetwork.ZefaniaXmlCaption.CaptionTitle
member.summary: This attribut holds the caption title in long form, e.g. "Bereschit בראשית (Gen 1,1-6,8)"

member.summary: This attribut holds the caption type, e.g. "x-h2"

member.summary: This attribut holds the referenced verse number, e.g. "1"

member.summary: The referenced verse
